languages.text: "Священная тропа, по которой должно ступать в одиночестве". {n}Кибелла с пониманием кивает.{/n} "Неумирающий будет оценивать твою душу, и суд Его будет строг, а вердикт — неумолим".
"It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."
languages.original_text: "Священная тропа, по которой должно ступать в одиночестве". {n}Кибелла с пониманием кивает.{/n} "Неумирающий будет оценивать твою душу, и суд Его будет строг, а вердикт — неумолим".

"It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."

languages.text: «Es un camino sagrado que se debe recorrer en solitario». {n}Kibellah asiente.{/n} «El Inmortal medirá su alma. Su juicio será severo y Su veredicto firme».
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."

traits.locale_text: «Es un camino sagrado que se debe recorrer en solitario». {n}Kibellah asiente.{/n} «El Inmortal medirá su alma. Su juicio será severo y Su veredicto firme».

languages.text: 「一人で歩かなければならない、神聖な道です」{n}キベラはうなずいた。{/n}「不死の者があなたの魂を測ります。その判断は厳しく、その評決は不屈のものであろう」
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."

traits.locale_text: 「一人で歩かなければならない、神聖な道です」{n}キベラはうなずいた。{/n}「不死の者があなたの魂を測ります。その判断は厳しく、その評決は不屈のものであろう」

languages.text: “这条神圣的道路必须独自完成。”{n}绮贝菈点了点头。{/n}“不死之神将会衡量你的灵魂。祂的审判无比严厉，祂的判决毫不让步。”
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."

traits.locale_text: “这条神圣的道路必须独自完成。”{n}绮贝菈点了点头。{/n}“不死之神将会衡量你的灵魂。祂的审判无比严厉，祂的判决毫不让步。”

languages.text: "Es ist ein heiliger Pfad, der alleine beschritten werden muss." {n}Kibellah nickt.{/n} "Der Todlose wird Eure Seele beurteilen. Sein Richtspruch wird streng sein und Sein Urteil unnachgiebig."
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein heiliger Pfad, der alleine beschritten werden muss." {n}Kibellah nickt.{/n} "Der Todlose wird Eure Seele beurteilen. Sein Richtspruch wird streng sein und Sein Urteil unnachgiebig."

languages.text: « C'est une voie sacrée que chacun doit arpenter seul, {n}acquiesce Kibellah.{/n} L'Immortel mesurera votre âme à l'aune de son jugement sévère, et Son verdict sera sans appel. »
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une voie sacrée que chacun doit arpenter seul, {n}acquiesce Kibellah.{/n} L'Immortel mesurera votre âme à l'aune de son jugement sévère, et Son verdict sera sans appel. »

languages.text: "Bu, kişinin yalnız yürümesi gereken kutsal bir yoldur." {n}Kibellah başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ölmeyen, ruhunu tartacak. Hükmü sert, cezası sarsılmazdır."
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred path that one must walk alone." {n}Kibellah nods.{/n} "The Undying One will measure your soul. His judgement will be stern, and His verdict unyielding."
